name: Samayo
description:
Samayo will be a Zelda inspired adventure game. The player will travel the open world and search for dungeons to explore and villages to roam in. Right now I don't have any other developers on the project, so music, art, and programming will all be done by me. If you want to talk about the game or have any questions post a comment.

If you want to support the project, but can't afford too , then spread the word.

Thanks for giving this a look.
